definition: to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip

sentences.english: You are the most loving and caring person any friend could ever have.
sentences.chinese: 您是夫复何求最可爱最贴心的朋友。

sentences.english: Tailer-Made Services to meet the Requirements and Expectations of the Customer.
sentences.chinese: 人性化贴心服务，超乎客户的需求和期望。

sentences.english: You are a good investment intimate partner.
sentences.chinese: 是您投资的贴心好伴侣。

sentences.english: Dot take for granted the things closest to your heart.
sentences.chinese: 别把最贴心的事情当成理所当然。

sentences.english: Such considerate and thoughtful service is rarely found in other international conferences except for Sakyadhita.
sentences.chinese: 这样周到而贴心的服务，在国际会议中极其罕见。

sentences.english: Chairman Tony Lo was massaged by his wife intimately.
sentences.chinese: 太太贴心的帮罗会长抓龙。

sentences.english: The most intimate friend of my is a hot-tempered boy.
sentences.chinese: 我最贴心的朋友是个暴躁的男孩。

sentences.english: Such a warm caring men, women can not be non-married.
sentences.chinese: 这等温暖贴心的男人，女人非嫁不可。

sentences.english: I thought it was the most thoughtful thing he could do.
sentences.chinese: 我想这是他能做的最贴心的事，他了解我的惊慌。

sentences.english: The intimate comfort comes from all cotton products.
sentences.chinese: 贴心的舒适来自全棉制品。

sentences.english: The life of moderns is hectic, so many Chinese medicine shops offer to prepare your medicines for you.
sentences.chinese: 现代人生活忙碌，所以中药店有代客煎药的贴心服务。

sentences.english: Ultimately, it is both a practical and thoughtful gift.
sentences.chinese: 总之，它是一个实用并且贴心的礼物。

sentences.english: Crotch, stretch cotton fabric, breathable, intimate.
sentences.chinese: 裆内，弹力棉布料反面，透气，贴心。

sentences.english: I like every day to receive guests, intimate service for guests.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢每天接待客人时，为客人贴心服务。

sentences.english: Feel like before, and he was able to-heart, and mind really uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 觉得不像以前那样能和他心贴心了，心里真不舒服。

sentences.english: Intimate scale pen for quick design body, vivid lip to provide standard data.
sentences.chinese: 贴心刻度笔身，为快速设计生动唇型提供标准数据。

definition: aggrieved/dejected/(Tw, southern China) to be moved by a kind gesture etc/to feel gratified/to feel warm inside
to bless/to cherish/to take good care of/to conserve
a man who is family-oriented, considerate and protective
to cause no trouble/to be spared worry/worry-free
to belong or be dedicated exclusively to/proprietary/private/personal
convenient/suitable/to facilitate/to make things easy/having money to spare/(euphemism) to relieve oneself
(slang) to cheer sb on/to show one's support/("call" is pronounced approximately like English "call")
in touch with the common people/down-to-earth
